Articles.Content: Only one engine is working per side. In unity I have listed them all as empty children named thrustTransform. Am I missing something?

34 minutes ago, harrisjosh2711 said:

Only one engine is working per side. In unity I have listed them all as empty children named thrustTransform. Am I missing something?

Hi can we see the cfg ,

how should I load that up?
